definitions: The action of fastening or attaching with a pin or pins.
The action of holding someone or something firmly in a particular position.
The action of attributing or assigning something to someone or something.
The action of securing a piece of clothing with a pin.
The action of holding an opponent down in wrestling or similar sports.
examples: She was pinning the fabric to the board.
The wrestler was pinning his opponent to the mat.
They were pinning the blame on the new employee.
He was pinning up the hem of her dress.
The police were pinning down the suspect's location.
